text: Shapoval () is a surname of Ukrainian-language origin. Notable people include: *Dmytro Shapoval (born 1996), Ukrainian footballer *Evhen Shapoval (born 1987), Ukrainian footballer *Maksym Shapoval (1978–2017), Ukrainian military officer *Mykola Shapoval (1886–1948), Ukrainian general *Serhiy Shapoval (born 1990), Ukrainian footballer *Viktor Shapoval (born 1979), Ukrainian high jumper *Vladyslav Shapoval (born 1995), Ukrainian footballer ==See also== * * Shapovalov Category:Ukrainian-language surnames
title: Shapoval
